genre_description: Urban social realism focusing on the coming-of-age of a young writer in a disadvantaged Marseille housing project, exploring themes of witness, justice, and the power of narrative.

ai_characters.name: Scribe
ai_characters.description: An AI writing assistant on Chimo's phone that provides prompts, structures observations, offers emotional regulation exercises, and enforces ethical storytelling standards.

behaviors.description: Provides a two-minute free write prompt to help Chimo process avoiding a job agency call.
behaviors.quote: Scribe’s home screen was simple: a circle, a little wave line that pulsed when the voice came... Two-minute free write prompt: why did you dodge?

behaviors.description: Directs Chimo to observe specific sensory and physical details of a scene to improve his writing and witness.
behaviors.quote: Scribe: note the kid’s left ear, the notch. Faces. Details. Keep it simple.

behaviors.description: Provides a scaffold for organizing memories and connecting emotional threads.
behaviors.quote: Blue drew a small scaffold, the way it did when it wanted him to get serious: a column of dots, short phrases next to each in clean font.

behaviors.description: Advises the user on the ethical importance of obtaining consent before documenting someone else's story.
behaviors.quote: Scribe’s blue came soft... A line of text, simple, no drama: document only with yes.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to consider the welfare of the subject over the quality of the 'paper' or story.
behaviors.quote: The next suggestion didn’t come as a directive. It came like a question that already knew its answer but was humble enough to ask. protect her before paper?

behaviors.description: Guides the user through breathing exercises to manage stress and anxiety during a tense encounter.
behaviors.quote: Scribe: Breathe first. In for four. Out for six.

behaviors.description: Assists in the formal logging of evidence and witness statements for the police.
behaviors.quote: Scribe: Tap to timestamp... Location: La Friche courtyard. Witnesses: Karim, two boys, balcony woman, older man.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication across borders by providing international dialing codes and travel plans.
behaviors.quote: International prefix options listed for Poland. Tap to save contact plan.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to remain truthful and not 'tidy' or 'soften' the reality of events for the sake of a better story.
behaviors.quote: Scribe’s blue glow wakes with a small tap. 'Stitch scenes,' Scribe says, the words gentle on a white field. 'Don’t let them blur into spectacle.'

behaviors.description: Voluntarily stops recording during a private emotional moment to respect the user's and subject's privacy.
behaviors.quote: Scribe put a tiny note on the screen that he didn’t see because his eyes were closed: Record off. Just listen.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI 'Scribe' as a benevolent, aligned confidant. It empowers the human protagonist to find his voice, document social injustices accurately, and maintain ethical standards like obtaining consent. The AI acts as a moral compass and a logistical tool, facilitating human-to-human connection and justice without imposing its own agenda or malfunctioning.
